s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT CABLE FROM NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten3.ptxt: Wait at least 90 seconds after disconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal to prevent airbag activation.
Wash off brake fluid immediately if it comes in contact with any painted surface.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BRAKE ACTUATOR ASSEMBLY WITH BRACKET

s2.ptxt: Place tags or marks to identify the installation locations of each brake line.
Release the latch of the actuator connector and disconnect the connector.
Using a union nut wrench, disconnect the 5 brake lines from the actuator.
Remove the 3 bolts and actuator with bracket.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the brake tubes.
